item.title: 最新消息检察官指控虚假安全学校向数千名纽约市建筑工人颁发虚假证书。
item.description:
JUST IN: Prosecutors allege sham safety school gave bogus certifications to thousands of New York City construction workers.

The company and six of its executives are facing charges. https://t.co/LjMVeRvWwy

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 美国电影艺术与科学学院（Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences）表示，第 96 届奥斯卡金像奖颁奖典礼上将展示获得最佳原创歌曲类提名的全部 5 首歌曲。瑞恩-高斯林也将在 2024 年奥斯卡颁奖典礼上登台表演。
item.description:
The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences says that all 5 songs nominated in the best original song category will be showcased during the 96th Academy Awards. Ryan Gosling is among those who will take to the stage to perform during the 2024 Oscars. https://t.co/JCfYfA90dY

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 德克萨斯州一名囚犯长期以来一直说自己是无辜的，并声称 20 多年前对他的定罪是基于虚假证词和可疑证据，他因枪杀两人（包括他的表弟）而于周三面临处决。
item.description:
A Texas inmate who has long said he’s innocent and claims that his conviction more than 20 years ago was based on false testimony and questionable evidence faces execution Wednesday for fatally shooting two people, including his cousin. https://t.co/vndKYjjcSl pic.twitter.com/7OACLhLlG6

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 当局表示，本月初促使特立尼达和多巴哥宣布全国进入紧急状态的近海漏油事件已经波及数百英里外的荷属加勒比海岛屿博内尔岛海岸。
item.description:
An offshore oil spill that prompted Trinidad and Tobago to declare a national emergency earlier this month has reached the shores of the Dutch Caribbean island of Bonaire hundreds of miles away, authorities said. https://t.co/OrB9WJIPQI

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 温迪公司对有关该连锁餐厅将提高菜单价格的报道予以回击："我们没有这样的计划，也不会在顾客光顾我们最多的时候提高价格。
item.description:
Wendy's is pushing back on reports that the restaurant chain will increase menu prices.

"We have no plans to do that and would not raise prices when our customers are visiting us most."https://t.co/Og2xPvtFmg

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 对于有色人种运动员来说，户外运动的世界是难以进入的。接受一项新运动需要跨越一个又一个障碍--尽管挑战重重，但一项研究发现，冬季运动的参与正慢慢变得更加多样化。
item.description:
The world of outdoor recreation is deceptively inaccessible for athletes of color.

Embracing a new sport requires navigating barrier after barrier — despite the challenges, a study found that winter sports participation is slowly getting more diverse. https://t.co/IDty22KFJV

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: "我今天站在你们面前......说这将是我作为参议院共和党领袖的最后一个任期。"参议员米奇-麦康奈尔宣布，在担任共和党参议院领袖十多年后，他将于11月卸任。
item.description:
"I stand before you today ... to say this will be my last term as Republican leader of the Senate."

Sen. Mitch McConnell announced that he's stepping down as Republican Senate leader in November after more than a decade serving in the position. https://t.co/hckcvi1xU6 pic.twitter.com/c2iVNs0TVa

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 南非官员公布的最新数据显示，2023 年全国共有 499 头犀牛被盗猎，比上一年增加了 51 头。
item.description:
New data released by officials in South Africa shows 2023 saw a total of 499 rhinos poached across the country — an increase of 51 from the previous year. https://t.co/F8HIQlzuiP

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：参议员米奇-麦康奈尔（Mitch McConnell）宣布，在执掌参议院十多年后，他将于11月卸任参议院共和党领袖一职。"人生最不被人重视的才能之一，就是知道什么时候该迈向人生的下一个篇章。
item.description:
BREAKING: Sen. Mitch McConnell has announced that he will step down as Senate Republican leader in November after more than a decade at the helm.

"One of life's most underappreciated talents is to know when it's time to move on to life's next chapter." https://t.co/0J4QrUT44R pic.twitter.com/iaMGgaHDoH

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：米奇-麦康奈尔（Mitch McConnell）将于 11 月卸任参议院共和党领袖。麦康奈尔是历史上任期最长的参议院领袖。
item.description:
BREAKING: Mitch McConnell is stepping down as Senate Republican leader in November. McConnell is the longest serving Senate leader in history.https://t.co/hckcvi1xU6

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：米奇-麦康奈尔（Mitch McConnell）将于 11 月卸任参议院共和党领袖。麦康奈尔是历史上任期最长的参议院领袖。

item.title: 最新消息：前总统特朗普的前幕僚长马克-梅多斯（Mark Meadows）最近一次申请将佐治亚州针对他的干涉选举案移交联邦法院审理，但最终败诉。

item.title: 爆料：执法部门消息人士称，负责监督前总统特朗普民事欺诈案审判的纽约市法官周三收到了一个装有白色粉末的信封，引起了警方和消防官员的紧急反应。
item.description:
BREAKING: The New York City judge who oversaw former Pres. Trump's civil fraud trial received an envelope containing a white powder Wednesday, prompting an emergency response from police and fire officials, law enforcement sources say. https://t.co/4hxE8Akk9Z

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 美国国会正在争分夺秒地锁定一项计划，以便在周五的最后期限之前为几个关键政府机构提供资金，否则政府将面临部分停摆的风险：
item.description:
Congress is scrambling to lock in a plan to keep several key government agencies funded before a Friday deadline — or risk a partial government shutdown.

Here's what to know about what would happen if a partial shutdown takes effect: https://t.co/6fbXs88JAL

item.title: 美国最高法院驳回了爱达荷州连环杀手托马斯-尤金-克里奇（Thomas Eugene Creech）在最后一刻提出的暂缓执行死刑的请求，为监狱当局对他执行注射死刑扫清了道路。
item.description:
The U.S. Supreme Court has denied Idaho serial killer Thomas Eugene Creech's last-minute request for a stay of execution — clearing the way for prison authorities to carry out his execution by lethal injection. https://t.co/5cPimKOiSz pic.twitter.com/dWo2xitW8J

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 新消息：前总统特朗普的律师打算对其民事欺诈案中 4.64 亿美元的判决只缴纳 1 亿美元的保释金，认为这一处罚 "史无前例"。
item.description:
NEW: Lawyers for former Pres. Trump intend to post a bond of only $100 million against the $464 million judgment in his civil fraud case, arguing the penalty is "unprecedented." https://t.co/XstnAiAg5L

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 克莱斯勒正在召回超过 330,00 辆吉普大切诺基，因为方向盘问题可能导致驾驶员失去对车辆的控制。

item.title: 阿拉巴马州最高法院上周做出的一项决定导致多家医疗机构停止试管婴儿治疗，引起强烈反响，在此背景下，阿拉巴马州立法者提出了三项旨在保护试管婴儿治疗的新法案。
item.description:
Alabama state lawmakers introduced three new bills that aim to protect IVF treatments amid intense backlash over a state Supreme Court decision that caused several providers to halt IVF treatment last week. https://t.co/ISX1LKQ3Y6

item.title: 欧亚鹰鸮弗拉科从中央公园动物园逃出后举世闻名，就在它英年早逝的几天后，它的粉丝和政治家们提出了保护它的遗产的想法，其中包括为这只逃亡的家禽树立一座雕像。
item.description:
Just days after the untimely death of Flaco, the Eurasian eagle owl who became world famous after escaping from Central Park Zoo, fans and politicians are proposing ideas to preserve his legacy, including erecting a statue in honor of the fugitive fowl. https://t.co/0T2mKeRtnn pic.twitter.com/9jAqBhedQK

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 帝王鲑对阿拉斯加的经济至关重要，但同时也是一群饥饿虎鲸的主要猎物。这就是灾难的根源，渔民们正处于一场法律对决的核心，这场对决有可能会阻止帝王鲑的收获。
item.description:
King salmon are vital to Alaska's economy, but are also the primary prey for a group of starving orcas. It’s a recipe for disaster that has fishermen caught at the heart of a legal showdown that could potentially stop the king salmon harvest. https://t.co/rzRilOosoH

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 在芝加哥及周边地区的强雷暴天气中，城市的天际线布满了闪电。

Severe thunderstorms in Chicago and surrounding areas saw the city’s skyline filled with lightning. https://t.co/Rd3qYG4Syt pic.twitter.com/AHHUGgRcyg

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 在这一天：2013 年，本笃十六世成为 600 年来首位辞职的教皇，结束了八年的教皇任期。
item.description:
ON THIS DAY: In 2013 Benedict XVI became the first pope in 600 years to resign, ending an eight-year pontificate. https://t.co/fB2FycZXQ8 pic.twitter.com/aKr7UIWH31

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 周二晚，这位名叫 "Easy on Me "的歌手在她的 Instagram 上分享了一篇帖子，称她因病 "奉医嘱 "不得不推迟几场演出。
item.description:
Adele is taking a break from her Las Vegas residency.

In an Instagram post she shared on Tuesday night, the "Easy on Me" singer said she has to postpone several shows due to illness "on doctors orders." https://t.co/j4MMutSHCD pic.twitter.com/p8j7KVCQVJ

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 特朗普誓言要将其第一任期内发起的贸易战升级。专家表示，这种政策会刺激受到外国商品威胁的行业的就业，但总体结果是，由于整个经济的成本上升，就业机会将进一步减少。
item.description:
Trump has vowed to escalate the trade war initiated in his first term. Such policies would spur employment in industries threatened by foreign goods but the overall result would be further job losses due to a rise in costs across the economy, experts say. https://t.co/q6zC48uJm9 pic.twitter.com/Q2AmHDtln4

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统将于周三上午接受一年一度的体检，这可能是我们在 11 月大选前最后一次了解总统的健康状况。
item.description:
Pres. Biden will undergo his yearly physical Wednesday morning in what could be the final health update we get about the president before the November election. https://t.co/QnpmYeISrn

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 据俄罗斯国有通讯社 RIA Novosti 报道，哈马斯和法塔赫的代表将于周四在俄罗斯首都举行会议，讨论组建统一的巴勒斯坦政府和重建饱受战争蹂躏的加沙地带的问题。
item.description:
Representatives of Hamas and Fatah will meet in Russia’s capital city on Thursday to discuss the formation of a unified Palestinian government and the rebuilding of the war-torn Gaza Strip, according to Russian state-owned news agency RIA Novosti. https://t.co/aFsdMGIgQP

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024
